## Properties

| Property         | Attribute    | Description | Type     | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------ | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `image`          | `image`      |             | `string` | `undefined` |
| `label`          | `label`      |             | `string` | `undefined` |
| `maxFileSize`    | `size-max`   |             | `number` | `5`         |
| `maxImageHeight` | `height-max` |             | `number` | `4000`      |
| `maxImageWidth`  | `width-max`  |             | `number` | `6000`      |
| `minImageHeight` | `height-min` |             | `number` | `240`       |
| `minImageWidth`  | `width-min`  |             | `number` | `320`       |
